tool_description: Scheduler is a powerful and flexible API that enables you to manage schedules and appointments seamlessly in your applications. Whether you're building a booking system, a calendar application, or automating tasks that need to run at specific times, Scheduler provides the tools you need to make it happen.
name: Scheduler
title: Scheduler

api_list.name: getAllUserEvents
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scheduler15.p.rapidapi.com/users/events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scheduler15.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
